item.title: Optane Customer Letter March 2023
item.description: Dear Customer After careful consideration, in July 2022, Intel announced the end of future development of our Optane products. We are committed to supporting Optane customers and ecosystem collaborators through the transition of our existing memory and storage product lines through their normal end-of-life. Specifically, Intel will continue to support and warranty available products, including Intel® Optane™ Persistent Memory 200 Series and Intel® Optane™ SSD DC P1600X, P4800X, and P5800X Series products as noted on the Intel.
